statements: DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE customer_id = 500 AND transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_amount > 500 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = true AND severity_level > 2;
DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id = 100 AND amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM account_details WHERE account_id = 200 OR account_type = 'Savings';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 5000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE reason = 'Fraudulent activity'
